data.name: Escape From The BadTrip Episode 1
data.detailed_description:
Escape from the BadTrip: episode 1 - This is an action adventure game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a standard student Peter, who once went to visit his friends, but there he was met by his grandfather who gave him his special swill after which you will get into a bad trip. As the game progresses, the main character will try to get out of this world.

In this game you have to: get acquainted with different characters who will move the plot, Difficult boss battles, solving puzzles and finding secret doors. This game will appeal to those who love difficult battles, finished plot and interesting locations

data.short_description: Imagine how you find yourself in a world where there are knights and moonshine ... so stop what ?! Ah, congratulations! You are in the world of BadTrip! There will be knights, moonshine and Anatoly Ivanovich himself in this world! You just have to find out how you got into this world)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: intel core i5 7400
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 4gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ставил все в слепую
